titles.title: A bill to provide a cost-sharing requirement for the construction of the Arkansas Valley Conduit in the State of Colorado.
A bill to provide a cost-sharing requirement for the construction of the Arkansas Valley Conduit in the State of Colorado.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 108-271.

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: Amends Federal provisions relating to the construction, operation, and maintenance of the Fryingpan-Arkansas project, Colorado, to: (1) authorize appropriations for the nonreimbursable Federal share of costs of constructing the Arkansas Valley Conduit; (2) limit the non-federal share of such costs to 25 percent; and (3) allow up to 100 percent of the non-federal share to be in the form of in-kind contributions.
